dict.acceptation: 领袖，领导者；负责人；指挥者；领唱者；

sent.orig: You are not a leader to win a popularity contest-you a leader to lead.
sent.trans: 你不是要赢得人气奖的领导者——你是要领导的领导者。

sent.orig: This requires alternatively the role of discussion leader, project leader, rapporteur, or publisher.
sent.trans: 这就要求它扮演讨论带头人、项目领导者、报告人和出版者等不同角色。

sent.orig: Daschle was former Senate Majority Leader majority leader and a close adviser advisor to the president.
sent.trans: 达施勒是前参议院多数党领袖，也是总统的亲密顾问。

sent.orig: Leader This is the 8492nd leader. All 8492nd units, proceed as planned.
sent.trans: 我是8492队长，所有第8492部队，按照原定计划进行。

sent.orig: Leader Must be to Develop Relationships: Great interpersonal skills are for any leader to possess.
sent.trans: 领导者必须会建立关系：好的人际关系技巧是任何一个领袖必须具备的。
